name: Ahimsa Welfare Society
briefDescription: Ahimsa is NGO with the vision of the state of swaraj (independence) where everyone lives in peace, happiness, best of health, dignity and prosperity. At grassroots we are working for child rights & education, Natural resource management & planning, Health and community development issues. The resources available at ahimsa are getting used to produce maximum results for community, geographically located at Rajgarh district of Madhya Pradesh.Our inspiration comes from Gandhian teachings of development, that to be sought is human happiness combined with full mental and moral growth. This can be achieved under decentralization, community ownership on resources and stake in the local governance.
